mailPreset.EnglishMail_SecondWave:
Hello Madam, Sir,

I hope this message finds you well. I'm reaching out once more as, since our last contact,
I've had the opportunity to work on new projects, closer to my ambitions in terms of design and visuals.
I  believe my recent creations might resonate with the vision and aspirations of your studio, and I truly hope they catch your attention.

I am highly motivated by the opportunity to contribute my skills and creative vision to your team.
If it sparks your interest - as I hope it does - I'd be delighted to present my work in more detail and discuss the possibility of an interview with you.

For a quick overview you can watch my DemoReel on youtube : [DEMO_LINK]

Feel free to reach out if you would like further information.

Thank you very much for your time and consideration,
I look forward to hearing from you.

Best regards,

Delaporte Robin
mailPreset.EnglishMail_FirstWave:
Hello Madam, Sir,

I'm reaching out to express my genuine interest in your work and my enthusiasm for the possibility of joining your team.

As a recent graduate of ESMA Lyon, I had the pleasure of co-directing the short film TRASH in my final year,
which received the Jury's First Prize in Montpellier, last september.

I am truly inspired by your studio's creations and feel aligned with your artistic direction - it's the kind of work I aspire to create.
I'm highly motivated and believe my skills and artistic vision could bring value to your team.

For a quick overview you can view my DemoReel on Youtube : [DEMO_LINK]
If my profile interests you, as I sincerely hope it will, I would be delighted to present my work
in more detail and discuss the possibility of an interview.

Please don't hesitate to reach out if you need any additional information. 
Thank you very much for your time and consideration, and I hope to have the chance to meet
with you very soon.

Best regards,

Robin Delaporte
mailPreset.EnglishMail_SecondWave_v002:
Hello Madam, Sir,

I hope this message finds you well. Since our last exchange, I’ve continued to expand my skills, learn new softwares, and  develop new projects
which I believe align even closer with the creative ambitions of your studio. My Demo Reel has been updated to reflect this recent work, 
and you can view it here: [DEMO_LINK].

I remain deeply motivated by the idea of contributing to your team, bringing my expertise in 3D modeling, texturing, and shading.
Working with your studio would be an incredible opportunity to grow both professionally and artistically.
I can assure you that your projects represent exactly the kind of work I am most eager to contribute to.

If you’re interested, I would be thrilled to discuss my work in more detail or explore how my skills might support your upcoming projects.

Thank you very much for your time and consideration. I look forward to the possibility of collaborating with you.
Feel free to reach out if you need any additional information, or to arrange an interview.

Best regards,
Delaporte Robin
